alert.note: Alert for Delta; Hopkins; Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 6:15PM CDT until September 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hunt County in north central Texas... Northwestern Hopkins County in north central Texas... Western Delta County in north central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 615 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wolfe City, or 11 miles northwest of Commerce, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Commerce, Cooper, Wolfe City, Cumby, Campbell, Big Creek Lake, Cooper Lake, Klondike, Cooper Lake State Park, Pecan Gap, Ridgeway, Fairlie, Ben Franklin, South Sulphur, and Peerless. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 109 and 112. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
